faqs.title: What is SearchNEU?
faqs.description: SearchNEU is a search engine built for easier navigation of class and professor information to help students with course registration. Users can search for and explore all class offerings within a semester, all faculty of the University, sections for each class, and other important information. Additionally, SearchNEU allows students to subscribe to notifications for a class with no remaining seats, to get notified when an opening appears in the class.

faqs.title: Is there a limit on the number of notifications I could subscribe to?
faqs.description: Each user is limited to 12 subscriptions per semester. We recommend users unsubscribe from courses they no longer need to clear up space for different subscriptions.

faqs.title: How can I plan and track courses I have taken/want to take?
faqs.description: Use GraduateNU! GraduateNU is a Sandbox project that helps students Navigate the Northeastern graduation requirements and create a personalized plan of study.

faqs.title: When will next semester's classes become available?
faqs.description: SearchNEU is updated with the next semester's classes typically within 3 days of course information being released by Northeastern University.

faqs.title: How do I ask a question/report an issue?
faqs.description: Please share your thoughts using the Search NEU Contact Form.

faqs.title: Where does SearchNEU get its data?
faqs.description: All of our course data is public information we scrape from Northeastern, so you can access any info with a quick search on searchneu.com. For more information, refer to our developer documentation here: https://docs.searchneu.com/#/

faqs.title: Who currently works on / maintains SearchNEU?
faqs.description: SearchNEU is now developed and maintained by Sandbox. View our current team of developers and designers here: https://github.com/sandboxnu/searchneu?tab=readme-ov-file#contributors

faqs.title: What's next for SearchNEU?
faqs.description: We're always looking for ways to enhance the experience of using SearchNEU. Right now, we're exploring new features and potential integrations between SearchNEU and GraduateNU. We'd love to hear your ideasâ€”share your suggestions with us through the SearchNEU Contact Form!
